content.html: We've let the web shrink down to one puny "link in bio" on your social media profile, with services trying to charge you money for *links*! So we're fixing that at @Glitch, with the new FREE Glitch In Bio — a links page that does anything the web can do. glitch.com/glitch-in-bio
